name: sync::nonpoison::mutex::MappedMutexGuard::<'a, T>::map

core::convert::From::from.doc: Converts to this type from the input type.

sync::nonpoison::mutex::MappedMutexGuard: Unknown([Field(0, Ty { id: 11857, kind: RigidTy(Adt(AdtDef(DefId { id: 4690, name: "core::ptr::NonNull" }), GenericArgs([Type(Ty { id: 396, kind: Param(ParamTy { index: 1, name: "T" }) })]))) })])

doc:
Makes a [`MappedMutexGuard`] for a component of the borrowed data, e.g.
 an enum variant.

 The `Mutex` is already locked, so this cannot fail.

 This is an associated function that needs to be used as
 `MappedMutexGuard::map(...)`. A method would interfere with methods of the
 same name on the contents of the `MutexGuard` used through `Deref`.
